Update.Changes: Added detailed progress to list load and junk search. Added option to submit errors via NBug in soft crash box. Added registry junk scan in \EventLog\Application. Added registry junk scan in \Installer\Folders. Changed naming from "orphaned" to "unregistered". Fixed NSIS automatizer hanging on some uninstallers with non-standard button IDs. Fixed NSIS automatizer pressing wrong buttons if they are focused by default. Fixed crash in ScanAudioPolicyConfig if Uninstaller.InstallLocation isn't rooted. Fixed possible object disposed exception in InitiateListRefresh. Fixed rare crash when redrawing the application list. Fixed some grammar problems in readme. Misc code refactoring and cleanup. Updated TaskScheduler and Castle.Core packages.
